snippet: Mississippi State took the lead on Wes Rea’s two-run double in the eighth. The Bulldogs advanced to a game Monday against Indiana, which defeated Louisville, 2-0.
abstract: Mississippi State beats Oregon State, 5-4, in opening game of the College World Series.
lead_paragraph: Mississippi State took the lead on Wes Rea’s two-run double in the eighth. The Bulldogs advanced to a game Monday against Indiana, which defeated Louisville, 2-0.

headline.main: Mississippi State Wins Opener in Omaha
headline.print_headline: Mississippi State Wins Opener in Omaha
